alert.note: Alert for Addison; Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 3:14PM EDT until August 04 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Essex County in northern New York... Southwestern Addison County in central Vermont... Northwestern Rutland County in southern Vermont... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 314 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Coates Point, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... West Castleton, Sudbury, Shoreham, Orwell, Benson, Fair Haven, Whiting, West Haven, Hubbardton, Leicester, Castleton, Benson Bay, Bomoseen State Park, Coates Point, Black Point, Beadles Cove, Half Moon State Park, Larrabees Point, Beartrap Island, and East Shoreham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
